mapper.select: select m.NEWIDX as x,m.NEWIDY as y,d.Region as region from LTE_IMSI_TRACE_DATA d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.IMSI=#{imsi} and to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(#{beginDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') and to_date(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')

select m.NEWIDX as "X",m.NEWIDY as "Y",d.Region as "REGION" from LTE_IMSI_TRACE_DATA d inner join GRIDMAPPER m on d.GRIDX=m.GRIDX and d.GRIDY=m.GRIDY where d.IMSI=#{user} and to_char(to_date(d.Sdate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') = to_char(to_date(#{time},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi') and d.Region=#{region}
